data.actual_result: the member list closes but the server list stays open
data.expected_result: The member list and server list should still be showing
data.short_description: rotating your phone while having both the members list and server list open causes the member list to contract
data.steps_to_repro: - open the server list and member list by pressing the 2 buttons on the top at the same time- rotate your phone so its now horizontal
